nodes.text: Anora was a female Human who served in the Imperial Diplomatic Service of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War between the Empire and the Galactic Republic. She was the girlfriend of Vector Hyllus until he became a Joiner on Alderaan. Anora sent Vector a holomessage, pleading him to return to her and undo the joining process, but after contemplation Vector decided that he enjoyed his current situation better.
